questions.question: The Revolt of 1857 is also known as the ____.
questions.answer: First War of Independence

questions.question: Which incident immediately sparked the Revolt of 1857?
questions.answer: Greased cartridges issue

questions.question: Who was the leader of the revolt in Kanpur?
questions.answer: Nana Saheb

questions.question: Rani Lakshmibai was associated with the revolt at ____.
questions.answer: Jhansi

questions.question: Who led the revolt in Bihar?
questions.answer: Kunwar Singh

questions.question: The Mughal emperor declared leader of the revolt was ____.
questions.answer: Bahadur Shah Zafar

questions.question: Which place became the center of the revolt?
questions.answer: Delhi

questions.question: One major cause of the revolt was ____.
questions.answer: Economic exploitation

questions.question: The Revolt of 1857 failed mainly because ____.
questions.answer: Lack of unity

questions.question: What was an important result of the revolt?

options.text: Transfer of power to the Crown

questions.answer: Transfer of power to the Crown

options.text: Transfer of power to the Crown

questions.answer: Transfer of power to the Crown

questions.question: Why is the Revolt of 1857 called the First War of Independence?
questions.answer: Because it was the first united attempt by Indians to overthrow British rule.

questions.question: Mention two causes of the Revolt of 1857.
questions.answer: Greased cartridges issue and economic exploitation were two major causes.

questions.question: Who was Rani Lakshmibai?
questions.answer: She was the queen of Jhansi and a brave leader of the Revolt of 1857.

questions.question: What role did Bahadur Shah Zafar play in the revolt?
questions.answer: He was declared the symbolic leader of the revolt.

questions.question: Mention two results of the Revolt of 1857.
questions.answer: End of East India Company rule and transfer of power to the British Crown.
